CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>T</size>he orcs were not expecting an assault on the tower. You use your surprise to full advantage, hammering away at your foes. Then it's your turn to be surprisedâ€”you expected your furious attack to drop all who stood before you, yet still they stand.
<size=200%></size>One orc begins to chortle, followed by the rest. He barks something in their vile tongue. You don't understand the words, but the message is clear: you did your worst; now it's their turn.

Localization.Title: A Dangerous Business
Localization.Text: Restore every Enemy to full . If none are in play, add 2 random Orc units
